root.pub-comments: "The essential classification presented in Figure 1 [this tree] is that found in Benedict (1975:135 and chart there). The idea of using Kadai to designate the larger group with Tai under it is due to Haudricourt. The internal subgrouping of Kam-Sui represents an addition to the original configuration" (Thurgood 1988:180).
